### Rehabilitation of the Chlorination System of the Potable Water Plant

**Solicitation Number:** 21301-24-4479376
**Title:** Rehabilitation of the Chlorination System of the Potable Water Plant
**Reference Number:** cb-8199-13712140
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFQ)
**Publication Date:** August 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 19, 2023 (2:00 PM)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** October 2, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Summary of the Requirement:** The Correctional Service Canada is seeking a general contractor for a project involving the rehabilitation of the chlorination system at the Potable Water Plant. The objective is to replace the existing chlorination system, including the control and electrical equipment, at the Archambault Minimum Institution.

**Procurement Strategy:** This tender is a competitive procurement, open to all interested suppliers. The procurement strategy is based on lowest priced compliant bid.

**Contract Terms and Conditions:** The successful bidder will be required to perform the work within twenty (20) weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

** Administrating the Tender:**
Karine Clément, Contracting and Procurement Regional Officer
Phone: (514) 235-8177
Email: karine.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca

### Mandatory Documents

To respond to this solicitation, bidders are required to register on the Government of Canada’s Buyandsell.gc.ca platform. Bidders must obtain the complete Statement of Work (SOW) and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

### Other Important Details
Note to Bidders
* i) The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* ii) Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* iii) After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.
